column1: Art Institute of Chicago////A world class museum in Millennium Park that has an astonishing collection of impressionist art
column2: along with great collections of art from antiquity and beyond. They have a solid lineup of exhibitions that pass through the museum
column3: Andy Warhol currently! The geographical connection to the city
column5: and the lake combine to have an effect that you're not entirely sure where exactly the exhibits begin
column6: or end... it's not just within the walls of the building itself. Love it!
